response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product, which holds immense value to us and has the potential to significantly benefit you. After careful consideration, I propose to sell this exceptional item to you for $950,000. This price reflects not only the intrinsic worth of the product but also the unique benefits it offers to its owner. I believe this is an advantageous proposition that allows both parties to gain from this transaction. Should you be interested in proceeding, please let me know promptly so we can finalize the details.", "product_price": 950000}
